content.rendered:
Why Troika is Different

We are different in many ways that you would find apealling.

Christian Morals and Values are well articulated and taught so that our pupils and learners are built as young people who are sound academically and morally.


Low pupil to educator ratio: The ratio of pupil to educator in Troika is, and is kept, at a low rate for the purpose of effectiveness.


Multilingual Studies: To set our pupils ready for the realities of the twenty-first century, we emphasize on and teach French and Chinese.


Secure and Safe Environment: Our classrooms and premises are covered with CCTV camera, to add to the security proficiency that is in place.


Early Bird/After School Care: We also make provisions to take care of, and look after, pupils who might be dropped off pretty earlier in the morning as well as those who might be picked up late in the day, long after school hours
